segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like it's a treasure chest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on his mission that he doesn't realize how wobbly the stool is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of excitement for him, like he's on a secret adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for her share, and it's adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see the joy on their faces, even though I can't see their expressions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of my own childhood, sneaking treats when no one was looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they don't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could tip any second, and that makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't help but smile at their teamwork and determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before or if this is their first cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Either way, I'm rooting for them to succeed safely.
segments.speaker: PAR
